text:
w many people are affected by oculodentodigital dysplasia ?,"The exact incidence of oculodentodigital dysplasia is unknown. It has been diagnosed in fewer than 1,000 people worldwide. More cases are likely undiagnosed.",GHR,oculodentodigital dysplasia
What are the genetic changes related to oculodentodigital dysplasia ?,"Mutations in the GJA1 gene cause oculodentodigital dysplasia. The GJA1 gene provides instructions for making a protein called connexin43. This protein forms one part (a subunit)
